planner.app

Class LibraryApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • planner.app.LibraryApp

  • public class LibraryApp
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the business logic associated with the library application.
    Author:
    Hubert

    • Method Detail

      • adminLoggedIn

        public boolean adminLoggedIn()
        Returns:
        true if the administrator is logged in, false otherwise.

      • adminLogin

        public boolean adminLogin(java.lang.String password)
        Logs in the administrator provided that the correct password is supplied.
        Parameters:
        password -
        Returns:
        true if the administrator could be logged in, false otherwise.

      • addBook

        public void addBook(Book book)
             throws OperationNotAllowedException
        Adds a book to the library, so that it can be searched and borrowed. Only the administrator can do this. Thus, the administrator has to be logged in.
        Parameters:
        book, - the book to be added
        Throws:
        OperationNotAllowedException - if the administrator is not logged in

      • getBooks

        public java.util.List<Book> getBooks()
        Returns:
        the list of books currently known by the library.

      • search

        public java.util.List<Book> search(java.lang.String searchText)
        Search for a set of books by text. The text can be any substring of either the title, the author, and the signature.
        Parameters:
        searchText -
        Returns:
        a list of books containing the searchText in either title, author, and signature

      • adminLogout

        public void adminLogout()
        Logs out the administrator.
